1156160.name: Fantasy Grounds - D&D Storm Lord's Wrath
1156160.description:
D&D Storm Lord's Wrath

Storm Lord's Wrath from the Dungeons & Dragons Essentials Kit continues the adventure to aid the town of Leilon.
As the settlers of Leilon bend their backs to the arduous task of creating a defensible settlement in the dangerous wilds of the Sword Coast, even larger threats loom all around them.
Two forces of evil rise nearby, eager to control the region around Leilon and eventually the Sword Coast.
Storm Lord's Wrath is a D&D adventure designed for 7th-level characters.
Product includes:
  • Easy to read Reference Manual
  • 36 images to share with your players
  • 8 maps presented in DM and player versions
  • over 60 NPC and monsters
  • Story entries that are editable for keeping notes and making changes
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Zacchaeus
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
